titles.title: Genuine American Flag Act
To prohibit the importation for sale of foreign-made flags of the United States of America.
Genuine American Flag Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Genuine American Flag Act - Prohibits the importation for sale of foreign-made flags of the United States of America (regardless of size and whether or not in compliance with the standard proportions prescribed by Executive order).
